responses.remediationDetails: Identified memory leak in transaction processing module. Applied hotfix and implemented additional monitoring.
responses.followupDetails: System performing well under load. No further issues reported.

responses.complaint: Stock levels not updating in real-time
responses.remediationDetails: Database connection pool was exhausted. Increased pool size and added connection monitoring.
responses.followupDetails: Inventory updates now working correctly. Added automated alerts for connection issues.

responses.remediationDetails: Payment gateway timeout settings were too aggressive. Adjusted timeout values and implemented retry logic.
responses.followupDetails: Transaction success rate improved to 99.9%. Monitoring new timeout settings.

responses.complaint: Customer loyalty program not recognizing points
responses.remediationDetails: Points calculation service was down. Restored service and implemented failover mechanism.
responses.followupDetails: Loyalty program functioning normally. Added service health monitoring.

responses.remediationDetails: Report generation service was stuck. Restarted service and cleared stuck jobs.
responses.followupDetails: Reports generating successfully. Implemented job monitoring and auto-recovery.
